comments: Jackson (DET) maintains a legal guarding position and makes incidental contact with Dedmon (ATL) that does not affect his post move and shot attempt.
Collins (ATL) brings his arm down and makes contact with Jackson's (DET) head during his driving shot attempt.
Brown (DET) and Young (ATL) briefly engage and disengage off ball.
Collins (ATL) firms up in his screening position in Brown's (DET) path and absorbs the contact as it is made.
Brown (DET) makes marginal contact with Young (ATL) that does not affect his drive to the basket and shot attempt.
[Observable in enhanced video] Bazemore (ATL) is in the lane for longer than three seconds without actively guarding an opponent.
Dedmon (ATL) reaches in and makes clean contact with the ball while defending Drummond (DET) in the lane.
Prince (ATL) makes marginal contact with Drummond's (DET) off-arm that does not affect his shot attempt in the lane.
Collins (ATL) establishes himself in a screening position in Brown's (DET) path and does not deliver the contact.
Drummond (DET) slightly extends his hand against Young's (ATL) back but his momentum is already carrying him in that direction and the contact does not affect his ability to defend the play.
Bazemore (ATL) makes marginal contact with Drummond (DET) when he receives the pass.
LLB shows Bazemore (ATL) initiates contact with Drummond's (DET) left arm during his driving shot attempt.
[Observable in enhanced video] Dedmon (ATL) is in the lane for longer than three seconds without actively guarding an opponent.
Collins (ATL) establishes himself in a screening position in Brown's (DET) path and does not deliver the contact.
Brown (DET) makes marginal contact to the front of Young (ATL) during his drive to the basket that does not affect his shot attempt.
Collins (ATL) makes incidental contact with Maker (DET) during rebounding.
Bazemore (ATL) makes marginal contact with Jackson (DET) at the end of his drive.
[Observable in enhanced video] Drummond (DET) is in the lane for longer than three seconds.
Collins (ATL) establishes himself in a screening position in Brown's (DET) path and does not deliver the contact.
Ellington (DET) legally contests Carter's (ATL) jump shot attempt.
